title: Bavaria Bier
content:
The following website uses a nice Fleischmann-esque typeface, but I can't seem to find what it is. I checked H&FJ Mercury, FB Farnham and DTL Fleischmann, but none of them matches. Anyone?

[http://bavaria.nl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011102851/http:/bavaria.nl/ "http://bavaria.nl/")

-- [http://www.omine.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011102851/http:/www.omine.net/ "http://www.omine.net/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [brouwgeheimen.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011102851/http:/typophile.com/files/brouwgeheimen.gif) | 3.21 KB |
author: eomine

comments.content:
I think I am seeing [Charter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011102851/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/charter/), by Matthew Cater. Your gif is Charter Black.

- Mike Yanega
